feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [BHS/GRA][Managed Services] - Logs Data Platform maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 17, 12:00 - 16:00 UTC

Jul 18, 19:03 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our Logs Data Platform offering.

Start time : 17/09/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 17/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : The public API of Logs Data Platform product will be on read only mode during the whole maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on Logs Data Platform offering.
For more information about IAM for Logs Data Platform, you can visit this documentation: KB0071667

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS8][Key Management Service] - Rack BHS0817A03A
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 13, 11:00 - 19:30 UTC

Jul 16, 20:48 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 13/08/2025 11:00 UTC
End time : 13/08/2025 19:30 UTC

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [SBG8][Virtual Private Servers] - Network equipment maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 5, 12:00 - 13:30 UTC

Jul 31, 15:01 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network infrastructure in the VPS region SBG8.

Start time : 05/08/2025 12:00 UTC
End time : 05/08/2025 13:30 UTC
Service impact : The network of all VPS located in the region SBG8 will observe up to 2 seconds of packet loss. The packet loss will happen once per service during the maintenance window.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our network infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA1][Dedicated Servers] - Room G131
entry.content:
Aug 1, 04:43 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific room.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 01/08/2025 00:01 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the specific room are unavailable.
Root Cause : This incident follows this maintenance: https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/wb1r6dhl0mrv
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 1, 02:20 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an incident that is affecting the Dedicated Servers offer in the specified room.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 01/08/2025 00:01 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the specific room are unavailable.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA6][Virtual Private Servers] - Workflow Management service maintenance notification
entry.content:
Jul 31, 12:41 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jul 31, 10:30 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jul 30, 08:32 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Workflow Management service, Mistral.

Here are the details of the maintenance:
Start time : 31/07/2025 10:30 UTC
End time : 31/07/2025 12:30 UTC
Service impact : During this maintenance window for the Workflow Management service (Mistral), you may encounter the following impacts :

- Workflows in progress at the start of the maintenance will be stopped and will be restarted automatically after the maintenance is completed. We understand that this may cause a temporary disruption in your workflow processing, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
- Cron triggers (scheduled workflow executions) during the maintenance period will not be triggered. If you have any workflows scheduled to run during the maintenance window, we recommend rescheduling them to run outside of this timeframe to avoid any disruption.

Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be performing a maintenance on the Mistral service infrastructure. This maintenance is necessary to ensure the continued reliability and performance of our platform.

If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to our support team.
